original_title: Serafin Geronimo: Ang Kriminal ng Baryo Concepcion
overview: A lowly farmer whose wife is afflicted with a lingering illness gets involved in kidnapping that goes awry and culminates in tragedy. Years later, he turns to a crusading lady journalist to confess the details of the sensational crime that remains unsolved.
title: Serafin Geronimo: The Criminal of Barrio Concepcion
